entry.title: There can be a much longer title set in the MyTitle KA

entry.content:
Heading one - typing this directly in Tinderbox

Heading two - I have terminal open and running bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload

  1. Visual Studio code shows files in folders based on git branch that is checked out

quote : I would like to find out if finder does this in some fashion as it is very cool
